block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: continuously reading from DHT22 and display the readings
提取并显示 DHT22 的读数 extract and display the readings from DHT22
返回 2 个值 第一个值是摄氏温度 第二个值是百分比湿度 2 values returned 1st value is temperature in Celcius 2nd value is humidity in Percentage
DHT22温度和湿度传感器 DHT22 Temperature and Humidity Sensor
验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap
